content: I have a user reporting a search for qi-core renders a top result of www.hl7.org/fhir/current/qicore which no longer resolves. This is most likely due to publishing updates that require a reindex of the Google Search results. I did find a current version at http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/. Is this the correct location for information on QICore?
@Bryn Rhodes @Grahame Grieve
hmm I'll talk to Bryn about it - version questions....
This is the correct url for the publication: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/
